mapper.sql: sku_id AS "skuId", children AS "children",childrens AS "childrens",status AS "status", parts_id AS "partsId", spu_id AS "spuId",skus AS "skus",type AS "type", attribute AS "attribute", pid AS "pid", number AS "number", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId", part_name AS "partName", note AS "note"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_erp_parts where 1 = 1
and parts_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.partsId},'%')
and spu_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.spuId},'%')
and attribute like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.attribute},'%')
and pid = #{paramCondition.pid}
and number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.number},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and part_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.partName},'%')
and note like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.note},'%')

select
from daoxin_erp_parts where 1 = 1
and parts_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.partsId},'%')
and spu_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.spuId},'%')
and sku_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.skuId},'%')
and attribute like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.attribute},'%')
and pid = #{paramCondition.pid}
and status = #{paramCondition.status}
and number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.number},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and part_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.partName},'%')
and note like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.note},'%')
and type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.type},'%')
and sku_id in ( select sku_id from goods_sku where sku_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.skuName},'%') union select sku_id from goods_sku where spu_id in (select spu_id from goods_spu where name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.skuName},'%') ) )

select
from daoxin_erp_parts where display = 0
and parts_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.partsId},'%')
and spu_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.spuId},'%')
and sku_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.skuId},'%')
and attribute like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.attribute},'%')
and pid = #{paramCondition.pid}
and status = #{paramCondition.status}
and number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.number},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and part_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.partName},'%')
and type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.type},'%')
and note like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.note},'%')

select
from daoxin_erp_parts where 1 = 1

and spu_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.spuId},'%')
